Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Los Angeles (N) in 2015...
Injured on 7/19/2015 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/15/2016 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 7/16/2016...
Had first career hit on 7/21/2016, off Dillon Howard (COL)...
Injured on 6/6/2017 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/2019, going 4-1, 1.22...
Injured on 8/25/2019 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 5-6 weeks...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $6,321,429 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $6,321,429 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Won Cy Young in 2022, going 18-9, 2.95 ERA...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $6,321,429 through salary arbitration...
10/24/2023: Signed a contract extension with Los Angeles (N), $15,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (A) on 2/14/2024 to a 8-year deal worth $15,000,000 per year...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Los Angeles (N) on 2/15/2024 (Going to LAD: P David Davis. Going to LAA: SS Mark Teixeira Jr.)...
